name: star-magic-uqff
description: Star-Magic Unified Quantum Field Force (UQFF) - Advanced astrophysics simulation framework with 126+ modules

scripts.test:source134: node -e "const A2256 = require('./source134.js'); const m = new A2256(); console.log('✓ Source134 loaded:', m.getSystemName()); const report = m.generateReport(); console.log('M =', report.parameters.M.toExponential(2), 'kg');"
scripts.verify: node -e "console.log('Verifying modules...'); const idx = require('./index.js'); console.log('✓ All modules loaded successfully');"

author: Daniel T. Murphy
